attributes.action: Give free rent to all student accommodations; private and government based
attributes.additional_details: Through the corona virus, we are in lockdown. Many of us are back at home, out of a job and doing online university studies. We should not have to pay. Many accommodations have let there students off, but not private accommodations! We need this to happen for the students!
attributes.background: Give free rent to all student accommodations, across the uk. Both private accommodations and government funded.
